Westminster Bridge, River Thames & Big Ben Clock Tower

One of the world's most famous landmarks, this is where my MP (Paul Goggins, Labour MP for my constitiency Wythenshawe and Sale East), along with all the MP's along with the current PM David Cameron mud sling and raise issues.......and vote for any proposals for changes in the law ect

The iconic Houses of Parliament & Big Ben

A view of the London Eye, the Hungerford Bridge, Big Ben and the Houses of Parliament. The River boat services operate along the River Thames and is used by both commuters and tourists. London River Services began in 1999 are contracted by Transport for London (TfL). Photo taken on Thursday 4th April from Waterloo Bridge while on the tour bus
